|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6755; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 04:D9:F5 |oui = 04:D9:F5

|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, HE160, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth, AiMesh, LACP, DFS (master), DFS (slave), |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam1 = 4804 |rad3ax = 2402 |rad3ac = 1733 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Internally identical to the [[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] (2-pack) :''AX6600 Tri-Band Mesh WiFi 6 System''
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{FCC ST|03/21/2020|indexme.}} *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax routers'' on '''24wireless.info'''] (JP) {{See also|ASUS RT-AC95U|ASUS ZenWiFi CT8}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== * [http://promos.asus.com/US/PR/2019/computex_2019_asus_rog_awards/ ''ASUS Products Win 17 Awards for Innovation at Computex 2019'' on '''ASUS'''] * [https://www.engadget.com/2019/05/27/asus-wifi-6-router-looks-normal/#/ ''ASUS latest WiFi 6 router looks appallingly normal'' on '''Engadget''']
===Reviews=== *[https://dongknows.com/asus-zenwifi-ax-xt8-review/ ''Asus ZenWiFi AX Review: The Best AiMesh System to Date'' on '''Dongknows''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/maylyn-networking-asus-zenwifi-xt8.61050/ ''ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)'' on '''SNB''' forums] (''Maylyn'' Networking) <!--:Mesh node by [[ASUS RT-AX89X]] ([https://i.imgur.com/byYu04Q.png Web GUI images])--> *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-rt-ax95q-ax6600-aimesh-kit.56793/ ''New ASUS RT-AX95Q/AX6600 AiMesh kit'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-announces-zenwifi-mesh-solutions.58393/''ASUS announces ZenWiFi Mesh solutions'' on '''SNB''' forums] * [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/ces-2019-asus-announces-rt-ax58u-an-intel-based-2x2-dual-band-wi-fi-6-router.54373/ ''ASUS CES 2019'' on '''SNB''' forums] ([https://www.snbforums.com/threads/trio-of-new-routers-just-hit-the-fcc.58204/ FCC ID], [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-announces-zenwifi-mesh-solutions.58393/ Qualcomm])
==See also== ===Models=== :;[[ASUS ZenWiFi series]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AC (CT8)]] (AC3000) • [[ASUS RT-AC95U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AC-CT8/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)]] (AX6600) • [[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AX-XT8/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4R)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Router'' • [https://24wireless.info/asus-zenwifi-ax-mini-xd4 24|W] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE00 MSQ-RTAXJE00] (2020-04-13) • 12V/1.5A, 1x WAN, 1x LAN, BT • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4N)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Node'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE01 MSQ-RTAXJE01] (2020-04-20) • 12V/1.5A, 1x LAN • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage]
